attributes.action: Enforce 5 years residency for staying permanent in UK after leaving EU
attributes.background:
When article 50 is evoked and 2yrs later when we leave the EU, if EU nationals have not lived here for 5yrs, unless in a special critrea doctor/engineer etc they should be made to leave, as still arriving in thousands,under impression, whether 3yrs/3wks here  they can stay!!
this need sorting now!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking for EU nationals resident in the UK for at least 5 years to be granted the right to remain in the UK when the UK leaves the EU, if that's what you want to happen.
